title: ICE:panicked at 'expected `NodeId` to be lowered already for res Local(NodeId(14), )', compiler/rustc_ast_lowering/src/lib.rs:710:17

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { |arg| -> arg {} } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (7a9b552cb 2021-01-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7a9b552cb1621c9c57898d147228aab32b65a7c3 commit-date: 2021-01-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly ``` ### Error output ``` error[E0573]: expected type, found local variable `arg` --> perses_node_priority_with_dfs_delta_reduced_mutant.rs:2:14 | 2 | |arg| -> arg {} | ^^^ not a type thread 'rustc' panicked at 'expected `NodeId` to be lowered already for res Local( NodeId(14), )', compiler/rustc_ast_lowering/src/lib.rs:710:17 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (7a9b552cb 2021-01-12) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0573`. ```
Backtrace

``` error[E0573]: expected type, found local variable `arg` --> perses_node_priority_with_dfs_delta_reduced_mutant.rs:2:14 | 2 | |arg| -> arg {} | ^^^ not a type thread 'rustc' panicked at 'expected `NodeId` to be lowered already for res Local( NodeId(14), )', compiler/rustc_ast_lowering/src/lib.rs:710:17 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/7a9b552cb1621c9c57898d147228aab32b65a7c3/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt at /rustc/7a9b552cb1621c9c57898d147228aab32b65a7c3/library/std/src/panicking.rs:435:5 2: rustc_ast_lowering::LoweringContext::lower_node_id_generic 3: rustc_ast_lowering::path::::lower_path_segment 4: core::ops::function::impls:: for &mut F>::call_once 5: rustc_ast_lowering::path::::lower_qpath 6: rustc_ast_lowering::LoweringContext::lower_ty_direct 7: rustc_ast_lowering::LoweringContext::lower_fn_decl 8: rustc_ast_lowering::expr::::lower_expr_closure 9: rustc_ast_lowering::expr::::lower_expr_mut::{{closure}} 10: core::ops::function::impls:: for &mut F>::call_mut 11: as core::iter::traits::iterator::Iterator>::next 12: as core::iter::traits::collect::Extend<::Item>>::extend 13: rustc_arena::cold_path 14: rustc_ast_lowering::item::::lower_fn_body_block 15: rustc_ast_lowering::item::::lower_maybe_async_body 16: rustc_ast_lowering::item::::lower_item 17: rustc_ast_lowering::LoweringContext::with_hir_id_owner 18: ::visit_mod 19: rustc_ast_lowering::lower_crate 20: rustc_interface::passes::BoxedResolver::access::{{closure}} 21: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand::{{closure}} 22: rustc_interface::passes::BoxedResolver::access 23: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::lower_to_hir 24: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::global_ctxt 25: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 26: rustc_span::with_source_map 27: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 28: rustc_span::with_session_globals note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (7a9b552cb 2021-01-12) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0573`. ```
